name: HVAC Starter Pack - Phase 4 Enhanced
description: Production-ready HVAC configuration with behavior-driven timing and top-50 scenarios

tradeQA.question: What do you charge for a service call?
tradeQA.answer: Our service call fee is $89, which covers the diagnostic and is applied toward any repairs we perform the same day.

tradeQA.question: Do you provide emergency HVAC service?
tradeQA.answer: Yes, we offer 24/7 emergency HVAC service for urgent heating and cooling issues. Emergency service rates apply after normal business hours.

tradeQA.question: How much does HVAC maintenance cost?
tradeQA.answer: Our comprehensive HVAC maintenance service is $149 and includes a full system inspection, cleaning, and tune-up. We recommend maintenance twice yearly.

tradeQA.question: What warranty do you provide?
tradeQA.answer: We provide a 1-year warranty on all repairs and installations. Equipment warranties vary by manufacturer, typically 5-10 years on major components.

tradeQA.question: Do you offer financing?
tradeQA.answer: Yes, we offer flexible financing options with approved credit, including 0% interest plans for qualified customers on new system installations.

appointmentTypes.name: Installation Estimate
appointmentTypes.description: On-site estimate for new system installation

fallbacks.unknownQuestionResponse: That's a great question! Let me connect you with one of our HVAC specialists who can provide you with detailed information. They'll be able to give you the exact details you need.
fallbacks.technicalIssueResponse: I want to make sure you get the best possible help with your HVAC system. Let me transfer you to one of our experienced technicians right away.
fallbacks.pricingBeyondStandardResponse: For a detailed quote on that specific service, I'll connect you with our team who can provide accurate pricing based on your exact needs.

noHeatNoAC.response: I understand your heating/cooling system isn't working. This can definitely be an emergency, especially in extreme weather. Let me get you connected with our emergency service team right away.

routineMaintenance.response: Regular maintenance is great for keeping your HVAC system running efficiently! I can help you schedule that. What type of system do you have, and when would work best for you?

strangeNoises.response: Unusual noises from your HVAC system can indicate several different issues. To ensure we address this properly, I'd like to schedule a service call. Our technician can diagnose the exact cause and recommend the best solution.

silencePrompts: No problem — take your time. Let me know when you're ready.
I'm here. Whenever you're set, go ahead.
All good — I can wait. What would you like to do next?

frustration.response: Please, I am here to help you! You can speak to me naturally and ask anything you need — How can I help you?

behavior.whenInDoubt: Ok, to ensure you get the best help, I'm transferring you to a service advisor who can assist with your service needs. Please hold.
